general.navigateAwayMessage: If you leave the {0} now, your changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to close the {0}?
general.title: Canvas

home.caption: Transform a wall into a prized space in your home or a friend’s home. Use photos that capture prized memories and turn them into stunning wall decor. You’ll get to relive those memories each time you walk by your canvas print.

layout.title: Select a layout
layout.subtitle: Change the number of photos below

edit.lowQualityTooltip: Quality too low for current frame
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipLow: Please note that the quality of your photo is low so we can’t guarantee a great result. Would you like to proceed anyway?
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipMedium: Please note that the quality of your photo is not good enough to guarantee a great result. Would you like to proceed anyway?
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipHigh: The quality of your photo is good.
edit.photoQualityIndicatorTooltipExcellent: The quality of your photo is excellent!
edit.uploadPhotoButtonTooltip: Click here to add a photo

tooltips.in: Click to make the photo smaller
tooltips.out: Click to make the photo larger

addPhotoButton.tooltip: Click here to add a photo

edit.rotateLeft: Click here to rotate your photo counter clockwise
edit.rotateRight: Click here to rotate your photo clockwise

order.numberOfCopiesDescription: (Select the desired number of copies here)
order.promoDescription: Do you have a promotion code? Please enter the code below.
order.promotionPopupTitle: Sorry, that’s an invalid promotion code
order.promotionPopupSubtitle: Sorry, the promotion code you entered is invalid. Please enter a valid promotion code or order without one.

upload.uploading: Your photo is on its way to us . %3%%
upload.busyUploadingLabel: OK, your photo is on its way to us. Once we have it, we’ll place it on your {0} in high resolution. This shouldn’t take long. Once the upload is complete, you’ll be requested to make your payments.

help.helpText: View our Frequently Asked Questions page

alerts.invalidPromotionCode: Sorry, the promotion code is invalid

warnings.qualityTitle: Watch out: the quality of your image is too low!
warnings.qualitySubtitle: The quality of your image is not optimal for your chosen product. We want to ensure you receive the best print quality possible.
warnings.qualityOptions:
• make the least use of the zoom function;
  • choose a smaller product size;
  • use a higher resolution photograph.
warnings.qualityFooter: For more advice please contact our customer service team.
warnings.qualityButtonProceed: I understand the risks and wish to continue

lessPlaceholdersThanPhotos.message: You have selected a photo layout that contains fewer photos than the current page. If you continue, {0} photo(s) will be removed from the current page. Are you sure?

errors.errorBootstrapping: Sorry, a problem occurred during start-up. Please contact try again our customer service team or later.
errors.countryList: Sorry, a problem occurred while retrieving the country list. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.browserWarning: Sorry, you can’t design a product in this web browser. Please install the Google Chrome Browser to continue.
errors.lowMemoryWarning: Were you trying to add a photo? It looks like your device is running low on memory. Please close some of your running applications and try again
errors.defaultPrice: Sorry, a problem occurred while retrieving the price information. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.loadPhotoBitmapData: Sorry, a problem occurred while loading the photo. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.creatingPhoto: Sorry, a problem occurred while creating the photo. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.photoRegistration: Sorry, a problem occurred while creating the photo. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.addPhotoToPhotoPlaceholderEmpty: Sorry, a problem occurred while adding the photo the photo frame. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.addPhotoToPhotoPlaceholder: Sorry, a problem occurred while adding the photo to the photo frame. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.startUploadPhoto: Sorry, a problem occurred while initialising the photo upload. Please contact our customer service team or try again later
errors.setPhotoCanvas: Sorry, a problem occurred while switching between the products. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.createCustomer: Sorry, a problem occurred while collecting the customer details. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.createOrder: Sorry, a problem occurred while creating the invoice details. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.getInvoice: Sorry, a problem occurred while retrieving the invoice details. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.sendOrder: Sorry, a problem occurred while sending the order. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.
errors.getPaymentUrl: Sorry, a problem occurred while retrieving the payment details. Please contact our customer service team or try again later.

validations.emailMissingAtSign: You missed the @ symbol in your e-mail address. Please try again.
validations.emailMissingPeriodInDomain: You missed the dot (.) is missing in your e-mail address. Please try again.
validations.emailDomainInvalidFormatted: The domain of your e-mail address is invalid. Please try again.
validations.emailTooManyAtCharacters: Your e-mail address has too many @ symbols – very confusing . Please try again.
validations.emailConsecutivePeriodsInDomain: Your e-mail address contains repeated dots (.). Please try again.
validations.emailInvalidChars: The e-mail address you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
validations.emailInvalidIp: The IP address in the domain of your e-mail address is invalid. Please try again.
validations.emailMissingUsername: The username in your e-mail address is missing. Please try again.
validations.textTooLong: Sorry, the maximum number of characters has been reached
validations.zipcodeInvalid: Invalid postal code, use the format:
